WorkItem.Description:
The following seems to have been accidentally spammed all through ItemCache.xml : 
Â 
 <Warlock2T9>0</Warlock2T9>
 <Warlock4T9>0</Warlock4T9>

Comments.Message: It appears something in the code is adding those lines whenever the file is saved.

This seems to fix it, not sure if there are any side-effects though. --- old/Rawr.Base/Stats.cs Wed Sep 16 16:30:11 2009 +++ new/Rawr.Base/Stats.cs Wed Sep 16 16:29:23 2009 @@ -3695,7 +3695,7 @@ set { _rawMultiplicativeData[(int)MultiplicativeStat.Warlock4T8] = value; } } - [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute(0.10f)] + [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute(0f)] [Percentage] [DisplayName("% increase to your pet's critical strike chance with its abilities")] [Category("Warlock")] @@ -3705,7 +3705,7 @@ set { _rawMultiplicativeData[(int)MultiplicativeStat.Warlock2T9] = value; } } - [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute(0.10f)] + [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute(0f)] [Percentage] [DisplayName("% increase to damage done by your Immolate, Corruption and Unstable Affliction spells")] [Category("Warlock")]
Can you upload that code to the Patches section please?

nvm it's been fixed already (my file was a little old).

Please Close.
